mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO HORSESKINNY(HRNO, HRNAME, TRNO, RATING, RANKS, NATION, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TOTALRECORDS, CONSECUTIVEWINNINGP, COMPLEMENTARYRATE, WINNINGP) VALUES
(#{item.hrNo}, #{item.hrName}, #{item.trNo}, #{item.rating}, #{item.rank}, #{item.nation}, #{item.sex}, {item.birthDay}, #{item.totalRecords}, #{item.ConsecutiveWinningP}, #{item.ComplementaryRate}, #{item.WinningP})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE HRNO = values(HRNO), HRNAME = values(HRNAME), TRNO = values(TRNO), RATING = values(RATING), RANKS = values(RANKS), NATION = values(NATION), SEX = values(SEX), BIRTHDAY = values(BIRTHDAY), TOTALRECORDS = values(TOTALRECORDS), CONSECUTIVEWINNINGP = values(CONSECUTIVEWINNINGP), COMPLEMENTARYRATE = values(COMPLEMENTARYRATE), WINNINGP = values(WINNINGP)
